subject: Denver Haunts?
author: kolrone
full_text:
I'm flying to Denver for the week from Florida and am wondering if
there are any good places in Denver to investigate. I'm bringing my
equipment and am hoping everything will go smoothly at the airport.
Has anyone had any trouble bringing equipment on a plane before? I'm
going to research places in Denver and the vicinity that I can visit,
but suggestions would be good.

-Aaron
